snippet.title: The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
The Lord of the Rings Aragorn's Quest PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: September 14, 2010
Platforms: Nintendo DS, PlayStation Portable, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, Wii
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: OpenGL (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
Internal Resolution: 8x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Mipmapping: Basic (Fast)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
_____________________________________________
(✓) Enable HW Hacks:
(✓) Half-pixel Offset: Special (Texture)
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 16GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
_____________________________________________
Please leave a comment and rate it. :)
Enjoy !
